resources.string: Memorial to the Murdered Jews of Europe
Use long press to remove favorite

Favorites Places

Add new favorite places using the map.

Use the top menu to sort or show them all on the map

Search History

Find specific places and roads using the top bar… selections are added here.

 Press and hold an item for additional options
Wikipedia Reading List\n\nYour saved Wikipedia entries will appear here
This can take some time. Thanks for your patience
Thanks you, really means a lot and allows me to keep making B-Town better.\n\nIf you could rate us on the Play Store, that would be great.
Thanks you for your support… come back for new tours on your next visit
How was your experience with us?
Suggest what you want and we\'ll work on it!
Love to know what you think of the app
Tell us where we can improve…
Google Translator not detected on device (required). Would you like to install it now?
Instagram not detected on device (required). Would you like to install it now?
TransportR not detected on device (required). Would you like to install it now?
"B-Town | Maps and Tours for Tourist and Locals"
B-Town needs to store map tiles.
B-Town really needs those permissions for the map functions. Hope you change your mind and grant the permissions another time.
I needs access to your camera so you can take pictures.

The idea of B-Town came while travelling and wanting something that would give insider tips for various cities. If you have any suggestions of what you\'d like to see, let me know via the feedback button

Use the app to get details of your area, whether you\'re interested in local bars, restaurtants or sightseeing and included Wikipedia lookups to make it easy those to find extra places you may be interested in.

OpenStreetMap is updated daily by contributors all over the world… although I can\'t guarantee the correctness of their data.
If you find any issues with B-Town, please report them at the issue tracker.
%s is downloading. Please be patient. If you want a new map, let me know using the feedback above.
TODO - remove this and have a proper tab screen with libs used

Berlin is the capital city of the German Christmas Markets. From the end of November, the smell of great food and drink entice visitors to spend the evening exploring the sights and sounds on offer.END
